:cpaindh7, cpaindh8 = :cpaindh8, cpaindh9 = :cpaindh9, cpaindh10 = :cpaindh10, cpaindh11 = :cpaindh11, cpaindh12 = :cpaindh12, cpaindh13 = :cpaindh13, cpaindh14 = :cpaindh14, cpaindh15 = :cpaindh15, cpaindh88 = :cpaindh88, cpaindh89 = :cpaindh89, cpaindh90 = :cpaindh90, cpaindh91 = :cpaindh91, cpaindh92 = :cpaindh92, cpaindh93 = :cpaindh93, cpaindh94 = :cpaindh94, cpaindh95 = :cpaindh95, cpaindh96 = :cpaindh96, cpaindusucreacion = :cpaindusucreacion, cpaindfeccreacion = :cpaindfeccreacion where cpaindcodi = :cpaindcodi

select cpaindcodi, cpainmcodi, cparcodi, cpaindtipinsumo, cpaindtipproceso, emprcodi, equicodi, cpainddia, cpaindtotaldia, cpaindh1, cpaindh2, cpaindh3, cpaindh4, cpaindh5, cpaindh6, cpaindh7, cpaindh8, cpaindh9, cpaindh10, cpaindh11, cpaindh12, cpaindh13, cpaindh14, cpaindh15, cpaindh16, cpaindh17, cpaindh18, cpaindh19, cpaindh20, cpaindh21, cpaindh22, cpaindh23, cpaindh24, cpaindh25, cpaindh26, cpaindh27, cpaindh28, cpaindh29, cpaindh30, cpaindh31, cpaindh32, cpaindh33, cpaindh34, cpaindh35, cpaindh36, cpaindh37, cpaindh38, cpaindh39, cpaindh40, cpaindh41, cpaindh42, cpaindh43, cpaindh44, cpaindh45, cpaindh46, cpaindh47, cpaindh48, cpaindh49, cpaindh50, cpaindh51, cpaindh52, cpaindh53, cpaindh54, cpaindh55, cpaindh56, cpaindh57, cpaindh58, cpaindh59, cpaindh60, cpaindh61, cpaindh62, cpaindh63, cpaindh64, cpaindh65, cpaindh66, cpaindh67, cpaindh68, cpaindh69, cpaindh70, cpaindh71, cpaindh72, cpaindh73, cpaindh74, cpaindh75, cpaindh76, cpaindh77, cpaindh78, cpaindh79, cpaindh80, cpaindh81, cpaindh82, cpaindh83, cpaindh84, cpaindh85, cpaindh86, cpaindh87, cpaindh88, cpaindh89, cpaindh90, cpaindh91, cpaindh92, cpaindh93, cpaindh94, cpaindh95, cpaindh96, cpaindusucreacion, cpaindfeccreacion from cpa_insumo_dia where cpaindcodi = :cpaindcodi

select cpaindcodi, cpainmcodi, cparcodi, cpaindtipinsumo, cpaindtipproceso, emprcodi, equicodi, cpainddia, cpaindtotaldia, cpaindh1, cpaindh2, cpaindh3, cpaindh4, cpaindh5, cpaindh6, cpaindh7, cpaindh8, cpaindh9, cpaindh10, cpaindh11, cpaindh12, cpaindh13, cpaindh14, cpaindh15, cpaindh16, cpaindh17, cpaindh18, cpaindh19, cpaindh20, cpaindh21, cpaindh22, cpaindh23, cpaindh24, cpaindh25, cpaindh26, cpaindh27, cpaindh28, cpaindh29, cpaindh30, cpaindh31, cpaindh32, cpaindh33, cpaindh34, cpaindh35, cpaindh36, cpaindh37, cpaindh38, cpaindh39, cpaindh40, cpaindh41, cpaindh42, cpaindh43, cpaindh44, cpaindh45, cpaindh46, cpaindh47, cpaindh48, cpaindh49, cpaindh50, cpaindh51, cpaindh52, cpaindh53, cpaindh54, cpaindh55, cpaindh56, cpaindh57, cpaindh58, cpaindh59, cpaindh60, cpaindh61, cpaindh62, cpaindh63, cpaindh64, cpaindh65, cpaindh66, cpaindh67, cpaindh68, cpaindh69, cpaindh70, cpaindh71, cpaindh72, cpaindh73, cpaindh74, cpaindh75, cpaindh76, cpaindh77, cpaindh78, cpaindh79, cpaindh80, cpaindh81, cpaindh82, cpaindh83, cpaindh84, cpaindh85, cpaindh86, cpaindh87, cpaindh88, cpaindh89, cpaindh90, cpaindh91, cpaindh92, cpaindh93, cpaindh94, cpaindh95, cpaindh96, cpaindusucreacion, cpaindfeccreacion from cpa_insumo_dia

select d.cpaindcodi, d.cpainmcodi, d.cparcodi, d.cpaindtipinsumo, d.cpaindtipproceso, d.emprcodi, d.equicodi, d.cpainddia, d.cpaindtotaldia, d.cpaindh1, d.cpaindh2, d.cpaindh3, d.cpaindh4, d.cpaindh5, d.cpaindh6, d.cpaindh7, d.cpaindh8, d.cpaindh9, d.cpaindh10, d.cpaindh11, d.cpaindh12, d.cpaindh13, d.cpaindh14, d.cpaindh15, d.cpaindh16, d.cpaindh17, d.cpaindh18, d.cpaindh19, d.cpaindh20, d.cpaindh21, d.cpaindh22, d.cpaindh23, d.cpaindh24, d.cpaindh25, d.cpaindh26, d.cpaindh27, d.cpaindh28, d.cpaindh29, d.cpaindh30, d.cpaindh31, d.cpaindh32, d.cpaindh33, d.cpaindh34, d.cpaindh35, d.cpaindh36, d.cpaindh37, d.cpaindh38, d.cpaindh39, d.cpaindh40, d.cpaindh41, d.cpaindh42, d.cpaindh43, d.cpaindh44, d.cpaindh45, d.cpaindh46, d.cpaindh47, d.cpaindh48, d.cpaindh49, d.cpaindh50, d.cpaindh51, d.cpaindh52, d.cpaindh53, d.cpaindh54, d.cpaindh55, d.cpaindh56, d.cpaindh57, d.cpaindh58, d.cpaindh59, d.cpaindh60, d.cpaindh61, d.cpaindh62, d.cpaindh63, d.cpaindh64, d.cpaindh65, d.cpaindh66, d.cpaindh67, d.cpaindh68, d.cpaindh69, d.cpaindh70, d.cpaindh71, d.cpaindh72, d.cpaindh73, d.cpaindh74, d.cpaindh75, d.cpaindh76, d.cpaindh77, d.cpaindh78, d.cpaindh79, d.cpaindh80, d.cpaindh81, d.cpaindh82, d.cpaindh83, d.cpaindh84, d.cpaindh85, d.cpaindh86, d.cpaindh87, d.cpaindh88, d.cpaindh89, d.cpaindh90, d.cpaindh91, d.cpaindh92, d.cpaindh93, d.cpaindh94, d.cpaindh95, d.cpaindh96, d.cpaindusucreacion, d.cpaindfeccreacion, e.equinomb, b.barrbarratransferencia from cpa_insumo_dia d inner join cpa_revision r on r.cparcodi = d.cparcodi inner join eq_equipo e on e.equicodi = d.equicodi inner join cpa_central c on c.cparcodi = d.cparcodi and c.equicodi = d.equicodi inner join trn_barra b on b.barrcodi = c.barrcodi where c.barrcodi is not null and d.cpaindtipinsumo = :cpaindtipinsumo and r.cparcodi = :cparcodi and cpainddia between :cpainmfeccreacion and :cpainmfeccreacion order by d.cpainddia
delete from cpa_insumo_dia where cparcodi = :cparcodi and equicodi = :equicodi and cpaindtipinsumo = :cpaindtipinsumo and cpainmcodi = :cpainmcodi
delete from cpa_insumo_dia where cparcodi = :cparcodi and cpaindtipinsumo = :cpaindtipinsumo

insert into cpa_insumo_dia (cpaindcodi, cpainmcodi, cparcodi, cpaindtipinsumo, cpaindtipproceso, emprcodi, equicodi, cpainddia, cpaindh1, cpaindh2, cpaindh3, cpaindh4, cpaindh5, cpaindh6, cpaindh7, cpaindh8, cpaindh9, cpaindh10, cpaindh11, cpaindh12, cpaindh13, cpaindh14, cpaindh15, cpaindh16, cpaindh17, cpaindh18, cpaindh19, cpaindh20, cpaindh21, cpaindh22, cpaindh23, cpaindh24, cpaindh25, cpaindh26, cpaindh27, cpaindh28, cpaindh29, cpaindh30, cpaindh31, cpaindh32, cpaindh33, cpaindh34, cpaindh35, cpaindh36, cpaindh37, cpaindh38, cpaindh39, cpaindh40, cpaindh41, cpaindh42, cpaindh43, cpaindh44, cpaindh45, cpaindh46, cpaindh47, cpaindh48, cpaindh49, cpaindh50, cpaindh51, cpaindh52, cpaindh53, cpaindh54, cpaindh55, cpaindh56, cpaindh57, cpaindh58, cpaindh59, cpaindh60, cpaindh61, cpaindh62, cpaindh63, cpaindh64, cpaindh65, cpaindh66, cpaindh67, cpaindh68, cpaindh69, cpaindh70, cpaindh71, cpaindh72, cpaindh73, cpaindh74, cpaindh75, cpaindh76, cpaindh77, cpaindh78, cpaindh79, cpaindh80, cpaindh81, cpaindh82, cpaindh83, cpaindh84, cpaindh85, cpaindh86, cpaindh87, cpaindh88, cpaindh89, cpaindh90, cpaindh91, cpaindh92, cpaindh93, cpaindh94, cpaindh95, cpaindh96, cpaindtotaldia, cpaindusucreacion, cpaindfeccreacion) select (rownum + :cpaindcodi) as cpaindcodi, :cpainmcodi, t.* from(select cpagercodi, 1, 'A', :emprcodi, equicodi, cpagedfecha, sum(cpagedh1),sum(cpagedh2),sum(cpagedh3),sum(cpagedh4),sum(cpagedh5), sum(cpagedh6),sum(cpagedh7),sum(cpagedh8),sum(cpagedh9),sum(cpagedh10), sum(cpagedh11),sum(cpagedh12),sum(cpagedh13),sum(cpagedh14),sum(cpagedh15), sum(cpagedh16),sum(cpagedh17),sum(cpagedh18),sum(cpagedh19),sum(cpagedh20), sum(cpagedh21),sum(cpagedh22),sum(cpagedh23),sum(cpagedh24),sum(cpagedh25), sum(cpagedh26),sum(cpagedh27),sum(cpagedh28),sum(cpagedh29),sum(cpagedh30), sum(cpagedh71),sum(cpagedh72),sum(cpagedh73),sum(cpagedh74),sum(cpagedh75), sum(cpagedh76),sum(cpagedh77),sum(cpagedh78),sum(cpagedh79),sum(cpagedh80), sum(cpagedh81),sum(cpagedh82),sum(cpagedh83),sum(cpagedh84),sum(cpagedh85), sum(cpagedh86),sum(cpagedh87),sum(cpagedh88),sum(cpagedh89),sum(cpagedh90), sum(cpagedh91),sum(cpagedh92),sum(cpagedh93),sum(cpagedh94),sum(cpagedh95), sum(cpagedh96), (sum(cpagedh1) + sum(cpagedh2) + sum(cpagedh3) + sum(cpagedh4) + sum(cpagedh5) + sum(cpagedh6) + sum(cpagedh30) + sum(cpagedh31) + sum(cpagedh32) + sum(cpagedh33) + sum(cpagedh34) + sum(cpagedh35) + sum(cpagedh36) + sum(cpagedh37) + sum(cpagedh38) + sum(cpagedh39) + sum(cpagedh40) + sum(cpagedh41) + sum(cpagedh42) + sum(cpagedh43) + sum(cpagedh44) + sum(cpagedh45) + sum(cpagedh46) + sum(cpagedh47) + sum(cpagedh48) + sum(cpagedh49) + sum(cpagedh50) + sum(cpagedh51) + sum(cpagedh52) + sum(cpagedh53) + sum(cpagedh54) + sum(cpagedh55) + sum(cpagedh56) + sum(cpagedh57) + sum(cpagedh58) + sum(cpagedh59) + sum(cpagedh60) + sum(cpagedh61) + sum(cpagedh62) + sum(cpagedh63) + sum(cpagedh64) + sum(cpagedh65) + sum(cpagedh66) + sum(cpagedh67) + sum(cpagedh68) + sum(cpagedh69) + sum(cpagedh70) + sum(cpagedh71) + sum(cpagedh72) + sum(cpagedh73) + sum(cpagedh74) + sum(cpagedh75) + sum(cpagedh76) + sum(cpagedh77) + sum(cpagedh78) + sum(cpagedh79) + sum(cpagedh80) + sum(cpagedh81) + sum(cpagedh82) + sum(cpagedh83) + sum(cpagedh84) + sum(cpagedh85) + sum(cpagedh86) + sum(cpagedh87) + sum(cpagedh88) + sum(cpagedh89) + sum(cpagedh90) + sum(cpagedh91) + sum(cpagedh92) + sum(cpagedh93) + sum(cpagedh94) + sum(cpagedh95) + sum(cpagedh96)) AS cpaindtotaldia, cpagedusucreacion, sysdate from cpa_gercsvdet_tmp where equicodi = :equicodi and cpagedfecha BETWEEN :cpainddia and :cpaindfeccreacion group by cpagercodi, emprcodi, equicodi, cpagedtipcsv, cpagedfecha, cpagedusucreacion order by cpagedfecha) t

insert into cpa_insumo_dia (cpaindcodi, cpainmcodi, cparcodi, cpaindtipinsumo, cpaindtipproceso, emprcodi, equicodi, cpaindusucreacion, cpaindfeccreacion, cpainddia, cpaindh1, cpaindh2, cpaindh3, cpaindh4, cpaindh5, cpaindh6, cpaindh7, cpaindh8, cpaindh9, cpaindh10, cpaindh11, cpaindh12, cpaindh13, cpaindh14, cpaindh15, cpaindh16, cpaindh17, cpaindh18, cpaindh19, cpaindh20, cpaindh21, cpaindh22, cpaindh23, cpaindh24, cpaindh25, cpaindh26, cpaindh27, cpaindh28, cpaindh29, cpaindh30, cpaindh31, cpaindh32, cpaindh33, cpaindh34, cpaindh35, cpaindh36, cpaindh37, cpaindh38, cpaindh39, cpaindh40, cpaindh41, cpaindh42, cpaindh43, cpaindh44, cpaindh45, cpaindh46, cpaindh47, cpaindh48, cpaindh49, cpaindh50, cpaindh51, cpaindh52, cpaindh53, cpaindh54, cpaindh55, cpaindh56, cpaindh57, cpaindh58, cpaindh59, cpaindh60, cpaindh61, cpaindh62, cpaindh63, cpaindh64, cpaindh65, cpaindh66, cpaindh67, cpaindh68, cpaindh69, cpaindh70, cpaindh71, cpaindh72, cpaindh73, cpaindh74, cpaindh75, cpaindh76, cpaindh77, cpaindh78, cpaindh79, cpaindh80, cpaindh81, cpaindh82, cpaindh83, cpaindh84, cpaindh85, cpaindh86, cpaindh87, cpaindh88, cpaindh89, cpaindh90, cpaindh91, cpaindh92, cpaindh93, cpaindh94, cpaindh95, cpaindh96, cpaindtotaldia) select (rownum + :cpaindcodi) as cpaindcodi, :cpainmcodi, :cparcodi, 2, 'A', :emprcodi, :equicodi, :cpaindusucreacion, sysdate, t.* from(select (:cpainddia + (cosmardia - 1)) as cpainddia, cosmar1, cosmar2, cosmar3, cosmar4, cosmar5, cosmar6, cosmar7, cosmar8, cosmar9, cosmar10, cosmar11, cosmar12, cosmar13, cosmar14, cosmar15, cosmar16, cosmar17, cosmar18, cosmar19, cosmar20, cosmar21, cosmar22, cosmar23, cosmar24, cosmar25, cosmar26, cosmar27, cosmar28, cosmar29, cosmar30, cosmar31, cosmar32, cosmar33, cosmar34, cosmar35, cosmar36, cosmar77, cosmar78, cosmar79, cosmar80, cosmar81, cosmar82, cosmar83, cosmar84, cosmar85, cosmar86, cosmar87, cosmar88, cosmar89, cosmar90, cosmar91, cosmar92, cosmar93, cosmar94, cosmar95, cosmar96, (cosmar1 + cosmar2 + cosmar3 + cosmar4 + cosmar5 + cosmar6 + cosmar7 + cosmar8 + cosmar9 + cosmar10 + cosmar11 + cosmar12 + cosmar13 + cosmar14 + cosmar15 + cosmar16 + cosmar17 + cosmar18 + cosmar19 + cosmar20 + cosmar21 + cosmar22 + cosmar23 + cosmar24 + cosmar25 + cosmar26 + cosmar27 + cosmar28 + cosmar29 + cosmar30 + cosmar31 + cosmar32 + cosmar33 + cosmar34 + cosmar35 + cosmar36 + cosmar37 + cosmar38 + cosmar39 + cosmar40 + cosmar41 + cosmar42 + cosmar43 + cosmar44 + cosmar45 + cosmar46 + cosmar47 + cosmar48 + cosmar49 + cosmar50 + cosmar51 + cosmar52 + cosmar53 + cosmar54 + cosmar55 + cosmar56 + cosmar57 + cosmar58 + cosmar59 + cosmar60 + cosmar61 + cosmar62 + cosmar63 + cosmar64 + cosmar65 + cosmar66 + cosmar67 + cosmar68 + cosmar69 + cosmar70 + cosmar71 + cosmar72 + cosmar73 + cosmar74 + cosmar75 + cosmar76 + cosmar77 + cosmar78 + cosmar79 + cosmar80 + cosmar81 + cosmar82 + cosmar83 + cosmar84 + cosmar85 + cosmar86 + cosmar87 + cosmar88 + cosmar89 + cosmar90 + cosmar91 + cosmar92 + cosmar93 + cosmar94 + cosmar95 + cosmar96) AS cpaindtotaldia from trn_costo_marginal where pericodi = :cpaindcodi and cosmarversion = :cpaindcodi and barrcodi = :cpaindcodi order by cosmardia) t

insert into cpa_insumo_dia (cpaindcodi, cpainmcodi, cparcodi, cpaindtipinsumo, cpaindtipproceso, emprcodi, equicodi, cpaindusucreacion, cpaindfeccreacion, cpainddia, cpaindh1, cpaindh2, cpaindh3, rerinddiafecdia as cpainddia, rerinddiah1 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah2 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah3 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah4 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah5 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah6 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah7 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah8 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah9 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah10 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah11 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah12 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah13 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah14 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah45 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah46 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah47 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah48 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah49 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah50 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah51 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah52 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah53 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah54 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah55 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah56 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah57 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah58 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah59 * :cpaindh1, :cpaindh1, rerinddiah68 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah69 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah70 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah71 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah72 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah73 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah74 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah75 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah76 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah77 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah78 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah79 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah80 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah81 * :cpaindh1, rerinddiah82 * :cpaindh1 AS cpaindtotaldia from rer_insumo_dia_temp where ptomedicodi = :cpaindcodi and ptomedidesc = :cpaindtipproceso and rerinddiafecdia BETWEEN :cpainddia and :cpaindfeccreacion order by rerinddiafecdia) t

insert into cpa_insumo_dia (cpaindcodi, cpainmcodi, cparcodi, cpaindtipinsumo, cpaindtipproceso, emprcodi, equicodi, cpainddia, cpaindh1, cpaindh2, cpaindh3, cpaindh4, cpaindh5, cpaindh6, cpaindh7, equicodi, cpagedtipcsv, cpagedfecha, cpagedusucreacion order by cpagedfecha) t

select inm.cpainmmes, ind.* from cpa_insumo_mes inm inner join cpa_insumo_dia ind on ind.cpainmcodi = inm.cpainmcodi where ind.cparcodi = {0} and ('TODOS' = '{1}' or ind.cpaindtipinsumo = '{1}') order by ind.cpaindtipinsumo, ind.emprcodi, ind.equicodi, ind.cpainddia
select count(*) as cantidad from cpa_gercsvdet where cpagedfecha = :cpainddia
update cpa_insumo_dia set cpainddia = ADD_MONTHS(cpainddia, :cparcodi) where cpainmcodi = :cpainmcodi
select count(*) as cantidad from rer_insumo_dia_temp where ptomedicodi = :cpaindcodi and ptomedidesc = :cpaindtipproceso and rerinddiafecdia = :cpainddia
